original: Linderoth, Mats Alexis, rektor, Emmaboda, f. 16/6/07 i Västerlanda, Gbgs o. Boh. 1., av folkskolilär. Richard o. Ester L. G. 42 m. Stintan Lindbom. Barn: Björn f. 43, Anne-Sofie 46. — Fil. mag. 34, folkskollär :ex. 35. Folk-skollär. i Gbg 35-37, e. o. ämneslär. i Rättvik 37-38, e. adj. v. samrealsk. i Katrineholm 38-39, ord. ämnesilär. v. Emmaboda komm. mellansk. 39-45, rektor där 43-45, rektor samt ord. adj. v. samrealsk. där sed. 45. Ordf. i lokalavd. av fören. Norden sed. 44, led. av kyrkofullm. sed. 47.
translated: Linderoth, Mats Alexis, rektor (principal), Emmaboda, born on June 16, 1907 in Västerlanda, Gothenburg and Bohuslän. Son of Richard and Ester L. G., both elementary school teachers. Married to Stintan Lindbom in 1942. Children: Björn, born in 1943, and Anne-Sofie, born in 1946. Completed a Bachelor of Arts in 1934 and received a teaching certificate in 1935. Worked as an elementary school teacher in Gothenburg from 1935 to 1937, substitute subject teacher in Rättvik from 1937 to 1938, regular subject teacher at Katrineholm from 1938 to 1939, and regular subject teacher in Emmaboda municipality middle school from 1939 to 1945. Became the principal there from 1943 to 1945 and continued as the principal and regular subject teacher at the secondary school since 1945. Chairman of the local chapter of the Norden association since 1944 and member of the church council since 1947.
